recipes.label: Labour as repetitive as the tick of the second hand.
recipes.startdescription: Since I was a child I have worked in my father's shop. But I do no more than clean parts and take orders.
recipes.description: No matter how I push myself, my father is never satisfied. But stacking boxes and dealing with customers at least keeps my body occupied, if not my mind.

recipes.label: More Machine Than Human
recipes.startdescription: The ticking of the clocks pervade my dreams, matching with the beat of my heart.
recipes.description: Sometimes, in my dreams, my heartbeat is the last sound that I hear before I wake. But sometimes, that beat is replaced with something else and I awake from the constraints of the emotional toil of the day, refreshed in spirit.

recipes.label: Responsibility, But Not Trust
recipes.startdescription: Father hints at one day giving over the store to me, but I cannot help but feel this will never happen...
recipes.description: He doesn't trust me. But he never gives me the opportunities to earn that trust. And so the hour clock comes back to 12 but the date never changes.

recipes.label: A Dealer in Junk
recipes.startdescription: Somewhere in the city is father's old aquiantance, Oriflamme, who from time to time buys the clocks that do not sell in the shop.
recipes.description: There are far more than unsold mechanisms here. Something about the items on display calls to me.

recipes.label: Read to Fall Asleep
recipes.startdescription: This nonsense seems like the perfect thing to send you to sleep.
recipes.description: You dream of a world that is made from clockwork, the sun moving across the sky on iron tracks as it hisses steam. On a moving pedestal is the book you were just reading. It unfolds like copper origami and reveals its secrets to you.

recipes.label: Read to Fall Asleep
recipes.startdescription: This nonsense seems like the perfect thing to send you to sleep.
recipes.description: You dream of a world that is made from clockwork, the sun moving across the sky on iron tracks as it hisses steam. You wake up unsettled.

recipes.label: A Secret in the Synopsis
recipes.startdescription: In your dream the book unfolded. Perhaps it can in the waking world, too...
recipes.description: Hidden within the cover was a strange blueprint. [needs more text]

recipes.startdescription: He has run into the workshop with the blueprint...
